about.title: Who am I?
about.introducing1: Hi, I'm Yana - Front-End Developer from Kyiv, Ukraine.
about.introducing2: I have serious passion for UI design and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.

description.fast: Fast load times and lag free interaction, my highest priority.
description.responsive: My layouts will work on any device, big or small.
description.intuitive: Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI.
description.dynamic: Websites don't have to be static, I love making pages come to life.

description.borodinskiy: Making a layout of multi-pages online-shop. Implementing sign up form.
description.pink: Creating website for photo processing application. Making cross-platforms layout using Scss, implementing JS-slider.
description.todo: Web application for creating and organised a tasks that you want to do.

description.1: Want to know more or just chat?
